name: 100 Steps to Victory
description:
Game for Indie Spain Jam 2022

theme - "From 0 to 100"

subtheme - Replayability

-------------------------------------------

What score will you get  with only 100 actions?

You only have 100 actions to get the highest score you can. 

Move through the floors of the dungeon, open chests, kill enemies, buy items and advance but keep in mind the steps you take, you can not do more than 100!

Get gold to buy skills and make your next Runs more effective and with a higher score! How much will you be able to get?

Share your Score on the comments!

Roguelike game created in 48h.

-- Endorth --
